metadata.title: CVE-2020-12066 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
CServer::SendMsg in engine/server/server.cpp in Teeworlds 0.7.x before0.7.5 allows remote attackers to shut down the server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12066` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

teeworlds - 0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1
teeworlds-data - 0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1
teeworlds-server - 0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: teeworlds package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1').
